metadata.title: NetworkManager: Denial of Service (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in NetworkManager. When a system running NetworkManager with DEBUG logs enabled and an interface eth1 configured with LLDP enabled, a malicious user could inject a malformed LLDP packet. NetworkManager would crash, leading to a denial of service. 
            STATEMENT: The impact is set to Low as it is very unlikely to have a production system running NetworkManager with DEBUG logs enabled.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
NetworkManager is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
